storyInfo: The workers have established the Londinium Industry Development Association with parliamentary support following the end of the war. Feist, now acting as its consultant, is active in the development of new technology and assisting with rebuilding. Shortages of resources remain a source of conflict, however.

attributes.content: <p=1>New Auchterigg, Vehicle Factory</><p=2>December 21st, 1098, 6:13 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: There you are, Captain! Here, take a look at this blueprint. Occ has been saying it's pointless to design a new electrical transmission distribution valve.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: But more and more big guys are gonna roll out from our factory to the other plates of Londinium!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: I say we ought to make preparations ahead of time.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: I don't want to hear people complain when they find that these things don't have enough power and torqueâ€”
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: 'Those short-sighted idiots!'
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: Stop calling me captain. This is a factory; we're not in the Self-Salvation Corps anymore.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Besides, I'm sure Occ has thought about it too. It's just about saving costs where you can.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I know, I know... but it's the young ones coming after us who would have to deal with any problems.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: I know how you feel, Martin.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But we have to take things one at a time. Closure shared a bunch of drone technology with us that I would love to put into our new four-legged crawler.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But problems like power supply and automation don't just solve themselves. It's all good to have them in the blueprints, but let's take one step at a time, starting with the present.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Let's do it Occ's way for now and get a basic version out to meet our present needs.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: File your blueprint with the Londinium Industry Development Association. Don't lose it.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Its mission is to restore Victoria's technological superiority, with the support of Parliament. New ideas should be respected.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Whatever you say. You're a consultant for them, after all.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: There have been so many new ideas lately that it's getting hard to keep up.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: People are enthusiastic. They can feel that things are changing because of their ideas.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Yes. Factory production lines, a railway system that links all the districts, and walls and artillery that protect all of Londinium.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We can build them the way we want, with our own two hands.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I could agree with everything else, but please, not the way you want, Feist, or we're all gonna end up in one big amusement park, where the only form of transportation is ziplines.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: Come on, that's just the one that drew the most laughs amongst the proposals that got shot down. Not all of my ideas are like that.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: By the way, are you sure your factory wants to keep Occ in the core workshop? I heard he didn't get along with you at the old place.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Each factory has its own technical secrets, and there's been friction over competition for orders...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Well, that's true. Not all of our workers were in the Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: But if Catherine could convince the other factories to join the association and share technologies, then there's nothing for us to hideâ€”
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Worker

attributes.content: Somebody! Help!
attributes.name: Anxious Worker

attributes.content: Matthew just got pummeled!
attributes.name: Anxious Worker

attributes.content: Have we met before, sir?
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Not exactly, Madam Speaker.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: The name's Matthew, a humble businessman who owns a little factory. I simply felt the need to speak up about the present situation.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: You can write to Parliament, or seek assistance from the Industry Development Association. I have... other things that require my attention.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: I have written to Parliament on behalf of a dozen factories that were shut down. My letter's gone unread for the better part of a month.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: It was the decision of Parliament to shut down a number of factories. You know better than I the state of Londinium's logistics.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: The burden of one factory's debt can crush hundreds of families in Sudean or Highbury.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: We're just asking for the scales to be tipped a little towards usâ€”even if only in a private manner.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: Workers from factories that have been shut down could not even afford to buy medicine on the black market. An experienced line worker is worth ten pieces of machinery.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: I believe in my workers. There is much that they can still do for the city.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: Meanwhile, invaluable Oripathy suppressants are being wasted on dying soldiers on their beds in the Sanatorium.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: What are you on about?!
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Explaining the realities of economicâ€”
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: You bloodyâ€”
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Vina's fist found the man's nose before she knew it.
The man by the name of Matthew grabs his bleeding nose with one hand and searches haplessly for a handkerchief with the other.
Blood continues to seep from the gaps in his fingers, dyeing his clothes red.
More and more onlookers gather, all of them staring at Vina.
There is no hostility or anger in their eyes, but each and every gaze reminds her of her helplessness, of her ill-timing.
Iâ€”
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: I understand why you're angry, Madam Speaker. I know... but someone has to say it.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: I assure you it gives me no pleasure.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: I was part of the Self-Salvation Corps that stayed in the city. You came with the Cautus girl, and then you left.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: When the Exemplars came, and I learned from Catherine that you're their leader, I agreed to turn on the boilers to welcome you without a second thought.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: But I didn't recognize you when I saw you standing in the middle of the street, dressed like a king, promising a better life for everyone on behalf of Parliament.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: You knew that some promises could never be fulfilled. You chose to sacrifice some people to save others, didn't you?
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: She wants to shut him up.
She grabs the man by the collar and lifts him off the ground, but she can see his eyes, and the eyes of everyone standing around.
'Siege solves problems with her fists.'
She wishes she could make these problems go away with her fists, the way she used to.
Something falls out of her pocket and makes a clanging sound on the ground. It has been a long time since she had candy. She forgot the box was in her pocket.
We believed in you when we agreed to shut down and relinquish our Originium fuel. But now, we can only hope that we're not the ones being marked for sacrifice.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: Not all problems can be solved by your fists... Siege.
attributes.name: Downtrodden Man

attributes.content: Vina!
Let Matthew go. Please.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: <p=1>Speaker's Office</><p=2>December 21st, 1098, 7:32 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: ...Matthew's views don't represent those of all the workers.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Neither do mine, of course.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: All I know is that a few friends have reached out to Rhodes Island through me, hoping to improve the state of equipment at the Sanatorium. We can't make new equipment appear out of thin air, but maybe we can make the existing kit more efficient.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Most workers still support the current medical system, I think.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No, you don't have to explain, Feist. I was the one who let the blood get to my head.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: You have done as much as you could possibly do.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Improved medical equipment effectiveness, reopening the fast transport tunnels, the central heating system under experimentation... a lot of people have benefited from the changes in a short period of time.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: It's all thanks to how you've given us the green light and fended off trouble for us in Parliament.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That's my job. How is Catherine?
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Granny?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Well... I doubt she would answer, even if I asked. She won't even let people see her cough.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Otherwise, she's the same. Still busy, even though she's not working at the factory anymore. I rarely get to see her.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I had a conversation with her like this last month. She sat on this very chair, and turned down my invitation for her to become a Member of Parliament.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: The secret workshop that you kept hidden from the Sarkaz, and the weapon insideâ€”
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Londinium doesn't need it anymore.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Yes, I have reached a consensus with Catherine on this matter.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: As long as you and Catherine are able to unite most of the workers, it's not a bad thing for the weapon to stay under your watch.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Parliament needs oversight. So do I.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: The system of Parliament is yet immature. We're still searching, and there are people trying to get something done through it.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: But sooner or later, they must understand that the Parliament which revolved around the king is long gone.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Was it when the king wasâ€”erâ€”
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No... nothing changed with Parliament when he was hanged, other than power being transferred from the king to the dukes.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: It was only recently that the surviving fellows of the Royal Academy of Sciences were able to resume work on the chronicle of Londiniumâ€”
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: A million words that took half a lifetime to compile and edit, encompassing every aspect of Londinium.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: I never thought I would get to know my own home again from this angle.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: It was only after reading it that I realized the city's resistance began a long time ago.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: 'When the Sarkaz gained control of the city, it was the Londiniers who still lived within who had, of their own accord, come together to maintain the city's core functions, irrespective of upbringing and status.'
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: The Academy's fellows see it as the precursor to the new Parliament.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Seems a little... far-fetched? But it does make sense, in a way.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But I see another side, Feist. During the war, we were able to set aside our differences, our own interests, in our struggle to survive...
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Now, though, I'm not sure.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: There are times that I can't even guarantee my own reason. I need someone to pull me back when Iâ€”
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: You want it to be us?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That was my promise with Catherine. It was you lot who gave me my sword, after all.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: The war destroyed many things. Londinium needs your help in order to not fall behind the changing times.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Some of your ideas may create headaches in Parliament and the Royal Academy of Sciences, but that's not such a bad thing.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: A city defense system that belongs only to us, automation that the dukes have long ignored, and a new deterrent for a post-Steam Knight era...
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Your help is needed in all of this. And it must be for Londinium, not for any individual.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: I don't deserve your trust, Feist, and neither does Parliament in its current state... send Matthew my apologies again, if you see him.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: I will continue to lobby Parliament for policies that will improve the condition of workers.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: The medicine that we purchased from the dukes is on its way. Things will get better, once supply routes are secured.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Hah, who dares threaten the dukes' cargo ships?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: ...I'll continue to communicate with the ducal representatives in the city.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: We're here for you if you need any help.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Feist stands up, but then hesitates. He does not leave the room.
Granny always scolded me for my fancies.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But she said nothing the day I brought back the proposals for the future from the Industry Development Association.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: She retired from the line soon after, claiming health issues.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We like to dream about the future, Vina. We'll pull through.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The office falls quiet. Vina stares at the mountain of papers on her desk, then turns on the radio.
*Bzzt*â€”
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Late afternoon today, citizens witnessed the Speaker of Parliament, Alexandrina Victoria, put a scoundrel in his place.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: It was reported that a gentleman had attempted to bribe the Speaker for his own selfish interests, which the Speaker rejected in the most direct manner possible.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Many citizens speak highly of Speaker Victoria's charisma and believe that sheâ€”
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: <p=1>Londinium Underground</><p=2>December 21st, 1098, 8:01 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: I guess we've finally learned to trust each other a little bit.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Whether you're confident that this supply route is safe enough for one person to manage... or that most of you have left Victoria, just as you said.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Some sign of trust when you have your little trinket in plain sight.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: This is a city full of homeless, desperate people. Who knows if somebody won't get ideas?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Never said you're not part of the threat, of course.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Not that many people in Londinium remember Reunion's past.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: Go ahead, check. Everything on the list is here, and I'll deliver the next batch of medicine on time.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: You said most of you have left. What about Nine?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Left. Along with many people for whom there is no place in the city.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: Our factories outside the city won't be affected, of course. And the routes you found for us will continue to be useful.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: You're not going with them? Londinium isn't a great place for Infected anymore.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: 'Isn't a great place.' Spoken with true Londinier irony.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: When I was little, I was fascinated by the Londinium in the storybooks. The palaces and the gardens where the king and the young princess lived, the adventures to be found in the maze-like factories.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: Now I find that Londinium is no different from anywhere else in Victoria. It's no place to make a home.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: I stay because somebody has to, and I like doing good, honest work. Besides, the treatment of the Infected in Londinium today is... not terrible.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I followed them because they saved my life. I'm not like those who are ready to die, who've already figured out how to die for something worthwhile.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: Besides, in the end, it usually isn't worthwhile. Nobody deserves to die.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: You saved a lot of lives. Thank you, on behalf of the workers.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Stop by Highbury the next time you're passing out pamphlets in the city. I'll see right through that disguise.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: The goods check out. I'm off, then.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: One more thing, Catherine...
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: ...If the rocks hurt at night, I know a few techniques to make you feel better.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: I think you know... our medicine doesn't work as well as the stuff from the big pharmas.
attributes.name: Percival

attributes.content: Yes. It may fool the other workers, but it can't fool me. Same for most of the suppressants you can get in Londinium right now.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: At my age, though, I don't have too many lucid days ahead of me. And I guess you could say I've seen worse.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: One more day with my senses is one more thing I can do. That's plenty.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Our men have tracked down Reunion's hideouts outside the city, two major factories, and their supply routes.
attributes.name: Victorian Sergeant

attributes.content: Should we shut them down?
attributes.name: Victorian Sergeant

attributes.content: No need. Based on available information, they are not a threat to the citizens of Londinium.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Vina says she has personal reasons to be wary of Reunion.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: But even she admits that they were a big help to us when they incited the citizens to oppose the dukes.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: As for the gray market... just make sure we keep track of everything that's going on. Percival is not stupid. She knows what she's not supposed to touch.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The Reunion threat is much diminished now that their main members have left Londinium. Continue to monitor the situation.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I will even go so far as to say that establishing contact at a private level is an option, if there is consensus about improving the Infected situation.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Understood. We will continue to monitor Reunion activity without taking direct action.
attributes.name: Victorian Sergeant

attributes.content: I suppose I'm wasting you lot on this kind of work.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Of course not, Lady Delphine!
attributes.name: Victorian Sergeant

attributes.content: From the day we left the Duke of Windermere's ship, to setting intelligence work aside to focus on the assault of Londinium, and now...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: ...Do you miss the waters of Lynncardine?
attributes.name: Delphine
